notes.title: Review Express
notes.text: Don't forget to watch Traversy Media Express crash course! (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L72fhGm1tfE)

notes.title: Module 12
notes.text: lets finish up those first few sections!

notes.title: Garden Phase 2
notes.text:
1. Braid that stupid wire-vine weed into a giant ponytail to see if it looks cool
2. Plant the 3 mimulus
3. Transplant campanula around
4. Keep an eye on that justicia
5. Water the veg when it gets hot this week
